EmailTemplate.name: 1:16 GlobalMeet
EmailTemplate.subject: Is a Better Way to Conference Worth 1:16 of Your Time?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I know you are busy...so instead of asking you to read a long email here is a 1:16 second video of GlobalMeet. PGi's innovative next generation tools are saving my customers audio costs while at the same time adding access to difficult to reach countries. Take a look and let me know if you are interested in speaking further.
http://www.youtube.com/user/PGiPremiereGlobal?feature=watch
Best wishes,
"PGi - We Make Meetings Better for 75% of the Fortune 100"
